ygData.subject: Re: Need Help
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t have an answer, or at least I don t have one you ll like. I have heard that it is impossible to do-- the reason being that people would sell their
ygData.messageBody:
I don't have an answer, or at least I don't have
one you'll like. I have heard that it is impossible
to do-- the reason being that people would sell
their characters more easily, and Verant wants to
prevent that. <br><br>I had a similar question about
moving characters to different servers. In a recent
post, Absor said something like the only way to move a
charachter to another server is when the servers split.
Anyone know if this is true?<br><br>As for accounts, I
don't know, but would assume that it wont work. Who
knows though, e-mail Verant or pettition in the game to
see if it's possible!!! I'd love to hear the answer.
